Package hac.beans

Class PurchaseRequest

java.lang.Object
hac.beans.PurchaseRequest
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
@Component public class PurchaseRequest extends Object implements Serializable

PurchaseRequest component

Handle with the purchase request - receives purchase object and set of ids (string).
Since:
2023-05-31
